name: Paparazzi Prototype
description:
Who are you?
A beautiful woman?
Some lady dancing with a plant?
Bigfoot?

A paparazzi is fast approaching for a impromptu photoshoot. Try to pose for the best photos for your fans, but keep him at a distance or he'll collect the most unflattering ones, too far an no one will recognize you at all!

This is a experimental prototype based around the concept of Distance. It is more or less a proof-of-concept, therefore doesn't have a win or lose, but it is fun to uncover all of the photos if you can!

WASD to move
E to block incoming photos
Q to release confetti! (doesn't affect photos, but it looks nice!)
SPACE to pause game
ESC to quit

Credits in ZIP file.
